Articles.Content: Just a warning to have a look at windows 10 installed on someone else's computer first, as the fonts and graphics have been changed. Windows 10 will severly change how your computer works and major changes to lay-out. Currently I can not access most of my games on Steam. Windows 10 runs like an emulator when accessing the internet and can not handle having multiple tabs open.

You might have more luck on a Microsoft support site if you're having issues, there's usually some cause, also this isn't really *science*.

Moving to the Lounge ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I have 4 tabs open right now. install new graphics drivers.

[http://www.ubuntu.com/download/desktop](http://www.ubuntu.com/download/desktop) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

No, really. I think win10 will suffer from many bugs for some time, until Microsoft manages to get it more or less right. I think it will eventually get there, statistically speaking: Take a look:

Windows 1.0 (the first one): Good

Windows 95: Bad

Windows 98: Good

Windows NT/ME/2000: Bad

Windows XP: Almost perfect (my opinion)

Winows Vista: Bad

Windows 7: Good

Windows 8/8.1: Garbage (IMO The worst windows ever)

Windows 10: ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

How to notice, that Windows 10 is out?

Find "windows 10 problems" thread on every forum.

I've been running KSP on Windows 10 for over a week now with no issues. And KSP looks EXACTLY the same as it did on Windows 7 and 8. Font and all are the same. I actually find it a little bit of a boost in performance but that might be because I finally upgraded my 2 year old graphics drivers...

- - - Updated - - -
